text: It's a very happening place. The food options are good. The big play area on the second floor is also great for kids.
Just for happy hour at Have Fun.

Nice little mall. Many restaurants. Had a great massage at Absolute Massage. Coffee at 24 hour place at 4am. Breakfast at place in photo was good. Not great dinner at a fast food place. Forget place name. Connected to D'Resort by sky Bridge. Felt safe at 4am alone
A wide variety of food options!

There was alot of things like eatery places, cafe with food n drinks, clothes shop, wine shop, etc. One drinking cafe was so noisy they play darts, etc. Price of the drinks was ok. Another cafe is crazy happy hours end at 7.30pm n they want you to buy drinks from the tower. U must have a group not meant just for two persons. Very limited drinks they have not much options. There is Apollo banana leaf Indian restaurant too. U must go around n check it out for yourselves ok.
